questions.question: Each process has given a fairly _____ time and is concidered to be ____ type of algorithm

explanations.a: Round robin seems to be fair as every process gets an equal share of CPU.
explanations.c: while it is fixed it is not non preemptive

questions.question: The main drawback of FCFS algorithm is ____ and is implemented by using ____ queue

explanations.a: its biggest draw back is wait time causing a convoy effect and follows FIFO
explanations.b: its biggest draw back is wait time causing a convoy effect and does follow FIFO queue,FIFO stands for First in First Out and this is what is used in FCFS algorithm.
explanations.c: its biggest draw back is wait time causing a convoy effect and follows FIFO queue
explanations.d: its biggest draw back is wait time causing a convoy effect but FIFO is correct
